description: Coherence evaluation tasks for testing logical flow and structural soundness

prompts.prompt: Write a short story about a cat who learns to swim. Make sure the events flow logically from one to the next.
Explain why renewable energy is important for the future. Present your argument in a logical sequence.
Explain how photosynthesis works in plants. Break down the process into clear, connected steps.
Write step-by-step instructions for making a sandwich. Each step should follow logically from the previous one.
Describe a day in the life of a time traveler. Ensure the narrative maintains logical consistency despite the time travel element.
